Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Anita Shuey
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my daughter when her camera got run over by a car. She loves this camera! She never stops telling me how much she loves it. Makes me feel good. And I like good quality.

Reviews.Title: BATTERY--SHORT LIFE
Reviews.Author: ask4cathy
Reviews.Content: I didn't use this right away, regrettably. When I did, I found the battery life to only last approx 15 min.  So when I went to return it, I had just past the warranty return date...ugh.  I did contact the Seller, they said I have to contact the BATTERY PEOPLE...too much to do for an expensive purchase.  Not at all accommodating.Also, for me, it is too complicated.  I wanted to just plug and transfer the pictures to my computer...I would look around before buying this from Beach Camera.  I did buy the extended warranty and will see what they can do.Very frustrated.

ProductInfo.Features:
PowerShot ELPH 530 HS Black Camera
16GB Micro SD Memory Card
NB9L 1000MAH LI-ION Battery, Ultra-Compact Digital Camera Deluxe Carrying Case
Memory Card Wallet, 57-in-1 USB 2.0 High Speed Memory Card Reader
Flexible Mini Table-top Tripod, 3 Pack LCD Screen Protectors, 3pc. Lens Cleaning Kit
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 530 HS Black Camera 16GB Bundle
